title: It's time to accept that Darius is a weak, overrated champion
body:
I've been saying this for decades, he's WEAK. It's so easy to make him useless. With the upcoming nerfs, you'll never see him again. If you think the upcoming nerfs are deserved or if you ban Darius, you value your skill level below Silver. That's like being worse than Dyrus!

Edit: Already maybe I exaggerated, he's not weak but he's definitely not OP
